page.title: 08A PLAYGROUND GAME
page.content: "RAIN,SNOW,THUNDER,LIGHTNING" A group of children first decide by picking up or using a rhyme, who shall be "it". This person then asks all the others to perform, at the same time, a type of handstand."It must say "Rain,snow,thunder,lightning" and then the name of the handstand required. The person judged best then becomes "it", and the old "it" becomes one of the group for the next round. There are many types of handstand which may be asked for: "Jellywobble" in which the person has to waggle his legs; "Ballerina" where one leg must touch the bottom; "Banana splits" where a full splits should be attempted; "Policeman" where one must go over into a crab position and imitate the siren of a police car. There are also "Deadman","Radio"and "Scissors".
